bio.description: A certified foodie from Bahrain. I love to eat and I love to travel. I'm a big fan of Japanese cuisine and I'm always on the lookout for the best ramen in town. I also love to cook and I'm always trying out new recipes.

top_reviews.subject: My personal go-to
top_reviews.body: Honestly, Burger King is a no-brainer. Just go here if you're unsure where to eat. Best and safest choice for burgers.

top_reviews.subject: Good quality, saks taste
top_reviews.body: I like the tapsilog here. It's a bit pricey but it's worth it. The crepes are also good. I recommend the strawberry crepe.

top_reviews.subject: Hindi sulit
top_reviews.body: There are better options in Taft. I'd even argue you go to Starbucks instead. The food here is overpriced and the taste is just okay.
